name: Claire's Voyage
description:
A game created in 48 hours for Global Game Jam 2014 By the creators of Rude Bear: Alex Rose - Programming, Music and SFX Antony Dewar - Pixel Art and Web Page

Claire's Voyage is the story of a fleshling and her escape through a world indecipherable to the human mind alone. Claire's sidekick can help her see the world for its truth.

The theme was "We don't see things as they are, we see them as we are".

Controls:

  • Move with WASD/Arrow Keys
  • Jump with Space
  • Activate Switches with W or Up
